EmailTemplate.description: Internal notification to master BNF creator on approval of BNF record.
EmailTemplate.name: Master BNF Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Master_BNF__c.IMS_Sales_Org__c} : {!Master_BNF__c.RecordType} {!Master_BNF__c.Name} approved for {!Master_BNF__c.Client__c}
